title: Our Listener Just Won A Mercedes!
description:
Thanks to all #BertShowFam who bought a raffle ticket for a chance to win a new MERCEDES-BENZ! It’s time to give that MERCEDES away!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
